Package src

Class Figures

java.lang.Object
src.Figures
public class Figures extends Object
Manages a collection of drawable shapes on the canvas. Provides methods for adding, deleting, selecting, and saving/loading shapes.

  • Method Details

    • AddCircle

      public void AddCircle(int x, int y, int radius, Color colorOutline, Color colorFill, boolean filled, int strokeWidth)
      Adds a circle to the collection of shapes.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the circle's center.
      y - The y-coordinate of the circle's center.
      radius - The radius of the circle.
      colorOutline - The outline color of the circle.
      colorFill - The fill color of the circle.
      filled - Whether the circle is filled or only outlined.
      strokeWidth - The stroke width of the circle's outline.

    • AddRectangle

      public void AddRectangle(int x, int y, int width, int height, Color colorOutline, Color colorFill, boolean filled, int strokeWidth)
      Adds a rectangle to the collection of shapes.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner.
      y - The y-coordinate of the rectangle's top-left corner.
      width - The width of the rectangle.
      height - The height of the rectangle.
      colorOutline - The outline color of the rectangle.
      colorFill - The fill color of the rectangle.
      filled - Whether the rectangle is filled or only outlined.
      strokeWidth - The stroke width of the rectangle's outline.

    • AddPath

      public void AddPath(Shape path, Color colorOutline, Color colorFill, boolean filled, int strokeWidth)
      Adds a path to the collection of shapes.
      Parameters:
      path - The geometric path to add.
      colorOutline - The outline color of the path.
      colorFill - The fill color of the path.
      filled - Whether the path is filled or only outlined.
      strokeWidth - The stroke width of the path's outline.

    • GetFigures

      public Vector<DrawableShape> GetFigures()
      Returns the collection of drawable shapes.
      Returns:
      A vector containing all drawable shapes.

    • deleteSelected

      public void deleteSelected()
      Deletes all selected shapes from the collection.

    • deselectAll

      public void deselectAll()
      Deselects all shapes in the collection.

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all shapes from the collection.

    • saveToJson

      public void saveToJson(File file)
      Saves the collection of shapes to a JSON file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to save the shapes to.

    • loadFromJson

      public void loadFromJson(File file)
      Loads shapes from a JSON file into the collection.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to load the shapes from.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(File file)
      Saves the collection of shapes to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file to save the shapes to.

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(File file)
